definition: couplet (hung on the columns of a hall)
to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet

sentences.english: Learn couplets jazz funk style in this free dancing workout video.
sentences.chinese: 楹聯學會在這個自由爵士舞鍛鍊影片放克風格。

sentences.english: The above-mentioned two capital publish continent couplet written on scrolls complete collections of place collect and print and distribute.
sentences.chinese: 以上二首都被大陸出版楹聯大全所收集印行。

sentences.english: Before each couplet，there is a serial number，followed by its author and subject.
sentences.chinese: 每副楹聯之前有統一編號，作者和標題。

sentences.english: However, in turn, couplets but also has great inclusive.
sentences.chinese: 但反過來，楹聯又具有極大的包容性。

sentences.english: Tablets and antithetical couplets are the unique cultural products of China.
sentences.chinese: 碑記與楹聯是中國文化特有的產物。

sentences.english: Couplets may be called "dual structure" style.
sentences.chinese: 楹聯可稱之爲“二元結構”文體。

definition: rhyming couplet/pair of lines of verse written vertically down the sides of a doorway/CL:副[fu4],幅[fu2]
abbr. for 中國文學藝術界聯合會|中国文学艺术界联合会, China Federation of Literary and Art Circles (CFLAC)
freehand drawing or painting in traditional Chinese style
study of the Book of Changes 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1]
